body.description: Just like our founder, H.D. Lee, our passion is helping can-do people do more. We are committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely. We help you chase the things that bring you joy and laughter. The things that make you fearless and hopefully because your passion is what makes you unique. And what moves you, moves us. Move your Lee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Live these Jeans
reviews.reviewText: They are so comfortable thT I wear them most of the time. Great style, nice fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite pair of jeans!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two pairs, first time I bought two sizes ot 22’s felt like they’d be good wore one of them for a bit left one in the bag. I returned one pair bought a 20 short. Which fit really well. I thought there was no hope in ever finding nice fitting jeans for fluffy women. I wanted real jeans not those jegings too and these are them! I love these jeans! Finally jeans that are comfortable that fit and are flattering. They have a nice stretch in the waist band as well it’s not your normal band. It’s really nice.I am 5’4 and 270lbs for reference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice jeans but way too long!
reviews.reviewText: They fit great! And they are great material but, the regular length (which normally would fit me) was way too long. I re ordered in a petite size and hopefully that will work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just as advertised! Great fit and quality!
reviews.reviewText: These are the best jeans for my body type! I have wide hips and a belly (thanks kids!!!) but a narrower waist. The elastic is hidden inside the waistband, so it is not seen--it does the job I need by fitting over my hips and yet leaving no gap at my waist. Good quality in the material and stitching.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very long inseam for a size Medium
reviews.reviewText: Too long, too loose, although I don't think I'd fit into a size 20W. Definitely need a belt with these. Fit is comfy around the thighs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HEY, WHAT’S TO SAY-
reviews.reviewText: These are Riders!! Worn them all my life, well 55+ years of it anyway. One of the few articles of clothing I can confidently order online knowing they will fit each and every time just as advertised and as expected!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size, which is a big bonus for plus size!
reviews.reviewText: I sent these as a gift and recieved wonderful reviews! "Sooo comfy and fit perfect!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fit great,comfortable right out of the package!! Ordered another pair.
reviews.reviewText: fit great,comfortable right out of the package!! Ordered another pair.

HelloI got these thinking? there like the regulars but no, they have this elastic waist all around the waistband.I had another pair that had the same, to much elastic felt like I was wearing a corset, those were Chaps.Stick with No Elastic - its' better to Breath....I do like the Lee Straight Leg. Those fit beautifully! And willbuy lots more of that style. I can't do skinny leg - I"m getting to old to fight with my clothing. Stick with thestraight leg if you have problems with the skinny leg.
These are very comfortable!!! Love them!!! 😁💜🥰
